instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion tsparticles @tsparticles/react @tsparticles/slim react-player lucide-react`
2. Create a `Login` component that blocks access until the password 'Harika@gandham' is entered.
3. Use the provided abstract background image for the entire app, with a dark overlay to ensure text readability.
4. Implement the Valentine's Week section as a horizontal scroll or grid of glass cards.
5. The 'Love Letter' should be a heartfelt, emotional section. Use a handwritten font style for the body.
6. Embed the YouTube playlist (search for 'Nuvuntey Chaley', 'Ayyayo' Telugu songs) using `react-player`. It can be a hidden player with custom controls or a visible stylish player.
7. Use `tsparticles` to create a click effect that spawns hearts or sparkles.
8. Ensure the Photo Gallery uses a masonry layout or a nice carousel for the couple photos.
9. STRICTLY follow the Dark Glassmorphism aesthetic. No solid white backgrounds.
10. Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
